Talk about coincidence---I just finished rewatching the PeaceMaker 
episode about the mad quest of young Ichimura to stay alive while hiding 
Hijikata's haiku book and found this site while trying to track down 
some info for the time travel story I'm puttering with--Poems by Emperor 
Meiji

http://www.threshold.ca/reiki/japan/URH_Gyosei.html

-- 
Barbara Sheridan
